channel.title: SignalHub: Toolchain Breakage Patterns
channel.description: Highlights of recurring breakages in compilers, build systems, and package managers.

item.title: GCC 10 -fno-common breakage
item.description: Multiple-definition linker failures occur because GCC 10 changed the default to -fno-common. Duplicate global definitions trigger errors and require using -fcommon or fixing code.

item.title: CMake 4.0 deprecated policies cause build failure
item.description: Projects that set cmake_minimum_required < 3.5 break under CMake 4.0 due to removal of deprecated policies. Updating the project or using CMake 3.x resolves the issue.

item.title: Pip strict resolver conflicts
item.description: Pip 20.3 introduced a strict dependency resolver. Installation fails with ResolutionImpossible errors when conflicting version requirements exist. Specify compatible versions or upgrade/downgrade packages.
